application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details including section drawing of the green roof, details of all metalwork including railings and balustrade, details of windows including typical section drawing at scale of 1:10 to show slim framing and recessed in from brickwork and relationship of frame to brickwork, details including section drawing of all new doors including bin store door, details of location, design and material of pipes/vents flues including rainwater pipes and details of joinery details of all new timer including shopfronts and conservatories pursuant to Condition 7 (a), (b), (c), (d), (e) and (f) of planning permission dated 18th March 2016 (RN:14/10452/FULL)
